review: easy to install, but I can't figure how to fast forward to skip the annoying ads.  Overall a great product.
author: Miss T "Terry"

review: We've had problems navigating the system and the directions aren't very clear.
author: Bette L. Liberatore

review: Easy, quick, reliable,affordable...what more do you need?
author: Doug Brandhof

review: This has changed how I watch TV... I used to clumsily hook up my laptop to the TV and have to sit on the floor to choose what I wanted to watch... now I can plug this in and go! It's also great to take to friends houses or hotels when on vacation. I loved it so much that I got the fireTV for the other TV in my house !
author: Debbie

review: It does everything I thought it would. Haven't had the chance to work with it a whole lot yet.
author: JoJo

review: Easy to setup and works perfectly.
author: chelsea carpenter

review: Before purchasing, I heard the Fire TV stick was slower than the Fire TV. I only have the stick, so I cannot compare, but I am very pleased with the speed of the Fire TV stick.
author: Amazon Customer
